post.author: MAZter
post.body:
Hey, there's a new beta of the game Doom: The Battle For Mars, DOOM RTS.



You all should really try it, it DOOM in RTS.
Visit: http://doomrts.com

post.author: Koroshiya Ichi
post.body:
nice!!

I'd very much like to see an RTS developed on Doom 3. Actually does anyone remember a game called Incubation?? Wasn't really an RTS, turn based but was very strategic, that would've worked beautifully well with the Doom 3 engine

post.author: bkt
post.body:
I'm sure doom3 could be weaved into quite a cool rpg. Even something like the alien horde mod (i think is the name) for unreal would be great with doom3's darker art assets.

*edit* This looks so cool

post.author: zeh
post.body:
That is pretty cool.

On the past few days I've been building a Tower Defense game (a kind of game mode Warcraft III popularized) in Flash for AS2 practice using id sprites (Wolf3D and Doom) as enemies for fun, look a bit like that

post.author: Kristus
post.body: MAZter: Cool. I didn't know you still were working on this.

post.author: Brandon
post.body: That looks cool, and downloading as i post this And i presume by the ad you guys use Game maker?

post.author: Jack Rammsdell
post.body: Really good keep up the good work, I like RTS games, usually i play red alert 2 or something but this would be fun to play over a lan. I wish the strogg war mod for quake 3 wasn't dead, that was a fun id based RTS game too. The game play was really solid, but there was just a few problems where the infantry would have troubles getting past or tree or something, but in all it was easy to get into and understand.

post.author: revility
post.body:
Great job! I really enjoyed this and can't wait to see it go further.

If you need sprite help, i know some people who could give you hand.

post.author: elusive
post.body: I LIKE it Nothing to add here! Keep up the good work!

post.author: MAZter
post.body:
Excuse for bad knowledge of English language.

Simply I am surprised with the limited interest to similar development.

The author of the project - DoomHacker, I help it.

I do not participate in development, but I am that person who has offered development of the project and I am engaged in its comprehensive support (a hosting, advertising, etc.).

P.S. Thanks that is pleasant to you Doom RTS.
